PerfectNetExp.abs: [8] 圣职推荐权（advowson）是向教会推荐圣职候选人的权力，推荐人一般拥有教会财产，因此享有此权。圣职推荐权有世俗财产的性质，可以.
Admiralty Droits 海事财产advowson 圣职叙任权Agister 牧业官
沪江词库精选advowson是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、英语短语、英音发音...名词讲解有以下几种: 圣职授与权  advowson的英语解释:  the right in.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'patronage of a religious house or benefice', with the obligation to defend it and speak for it): from Old French avoeson, from Latin advocatio(n-), from advocare 'summon' (see advocate)

means.word_mean: 1. the right in English law of presenting a nominee to a vacant ecclesiastical benefice
